mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.task_template_sid, t.task_template_name, t.task_template_code, t.project_type, t.template_time, t.remark, t.status, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name from s_prj_task_template t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t4.client_id
mapper.insert:
insert into s_prj_task_template
client_id, task_template_sid, task_template_name, task_template_code, project_type, template_time, remark, status, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.taskTemplateSid}, #{item.taskTemplateName}, #{item.taskTemplateCode}, #{item.projectType}, #{item.templateTime}, #{item.remark}, #{item.status}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
mapper.select:
select ptt.client_id, ptt.task_template_name, ptt.project_type, tbl_count.num as item_count, ptt.template_time as task_template_time, ptt.handle_status, ptt.status, tti.task_template_sid, tti.task_template_item_sid, tti.sort, tti.task_sid, tti.task_phase, tti.pre_task, tti.template_time as item_template_time, tti.plan_end_date_config, tti.overdue_warn_rate, tti.calendar_type, tti.relate_business_form_code, t9.task_name as pre_task_name, tti.is_monitor, tti.remark, tti.start_position_code, tti.charge_position_code, tti.notice_position_code, tti.handler_task, t8.task_name,
tti.create_date, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t10.handler_task_id, t10.handler_task_name from s_prj_task_template as ptt left join (select temp.task_template_sid, count(temp.task_template_sid) as num from s_prj_task_template_item temp GROUP BY task_template_sid) tbl_count on ptt.task_template_sid = tbl_count.task_template_sid LEFT JOIN s_prj_task_template_item as tti ON tbl_count.task_template_sid = tti.task_template_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON tti.creator_account = t2.user_name AND tti.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN s_prj_task t8 ON tti.task_sid = t8.task_sid LEFT JOIN s_prj_task t9 ON tti.pre_task = t9.task_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.task_template_item_sid, GROUP_CONCAT(tb.user_id ORDER BY tb.user_name ASC SEPARATOR ';') as handler_task_id, GROUP_CONCAT(tb.nick_name ORDER BY tb.user_name ASC SEPARATOR ';') as handler_task_name FROM s_prj_task_template_item ta LEFT JOIN sys_user tb ON ta.client_id = tb.client_id AND (ta.handler_task = tb.user_name or ta.handler_task like concat('%;', tb.user_name, ';%') or ta.handler_task like concat(tb.user_name, ';%') or ta.handler_task like concat('%;', tb.user_name)) GROUP BY ta.task_template_item_sid ) t10 ON tti.task_template_item_sid = t10.task_template_item_sid
and ptt.task_template_name like concat('%', #{taskTemplateName}, '%')
and ptt.project_type = #{projectType}
and ptt.project_type in (#{projectType})
and ptt.handle_status = #{handleStatus}
and ptt.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and ptt.status = #{status}
and t8.task_name like concat('%', #{taskName}, '%')
and tti.task_phase = #{taskPhase}
and tti.task_phase in ( #{taskPhase} )
and tti.relate_business_form_code = #{relateBusinessFormCode}
and tti.relate_business_form_code in ( #{relateBusinessFormCode} )
and tti.handler_task is null
and tti.handler_task is not null
and (tti.handler_task = #{handlerTask} or tti.handler_task like concat('%;', #{handlerTask}, ';%') or tti.handler_task like concat(#{handlerTask}, ';%') or tti.handler_task like concat('%;', #{handlerTask}))
and ( (tti.handler_task = #{handlerTask} or tti.handler_task like concat('%;', #{handlerTask}, ';%') or tti.handler_task like concat(#{handlerTask}, ';%') or tti.handler_task like concat('%;', #{handlerTask})) )
order by ptt.task_template_code desc, sort asc, t8.task_name asc
